reference.title: IPv6 address selection when presented with IPv4/IPv6 in transport layer address (Feature f11723-02): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature allows the MME to support and pass the S1-U transport layer address (TLA) of IPv4v6 address type received in either the S-GW or the eNB.

table.title: IPv6 address selection when presented with IPv4/IPv6 in transport layer address: feature summary

row.entry: Command gParms, parameters enbToSgwIpv4v6TransportLayerAddress and sgwToEnbIpv4v6TransportLayerAddress
